title: Algebra I Teachers' Instructional Improvement Strategies: Realistic Mathematics Education (RME)-Based Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary algebraic concepts (equations, functions, graphs, etc.)
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented educational program for in-service and pre-service teachers, conducting context-based learning activities with mobile applications in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: One can explain methods for analyzing students' self-generated models to solve algebraic problems in authentic contexts
One can design and implement teaching strategies that connect mathematical ideas based on Realistic Mathematics Education (RME) theory
One can integrate student questions into instructional design and provide feedback that facilitates model transitions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
